name: The Nutty Collector
description:
"The Nutty Collector" 

Try to prepare for winter collecting as many nuts as you can, avoid Freddy The Ant, But be weary as he gains speed as time goes on. Your safety Platforms will also be taken over slowly.

This game is designed to pass time, and is currently a single level single game mode only state, future updates may add more maps enemies and game modes.

Donations Are Greatly Appreciated and will be used for future projects, and progressing this one.

The Art In This Game Was Created By "Luis Zuno"
